mapper.insert: INSERT ALL INTO PRODUCT(NAME,DESCRIPTION,REGDATE) VALUES(#{NAME},#{DESCRIPTION},SYSDATE) INTO DELIVERY(TYPE,CLOSING) VALUES(#{TYPE},#{CLOSING}) INTO OPTIONS(NAME,PRICE,STOCK) VALUES(#{NAME},#{PRICE},#{STOCK})
mapper.select: SELECT P.ID,P.NAME,DESCRIPTION,D.TYPE,D.CLOSING,O.NAME,O.PRICE,O.STOCK FROM PRODUCT P INNER JOIN DELIVERY D ON P.ID = D.ID INNER JOIN OPTIONS O ON P.ID = O.ID
